response.overview: An enterprising mystery man has it out for poor WW. He knows he can auction her off for hundreds of thousands, but he knows he'll have to prove to would-be buyers that she's depowered, compliant, and ready to satisfy their every whim. After designing a ring with electrified ropes and magnetized corners, our mystery man sets up a once in a lifetime Pay-per-view presentation for folks to watch WW get completely broken down by Cheetah and Dr. Psycho, followed by a live auction to a select few bidders. The instructions for Psycho and Cheetah are simple: humiliate, violate, and destroy the poor heroine. She doesn't even know what's hit her and Cheetah and Psycho are ruthless and unrelenting, leaving poor WW so broken at the end, she thinks she's a slave for hire.
response.title: One Dumb Woman
